doc.previous: The distance between two different initial conditions in the case A 0 will change exponentially in most cases either converging exponentially fast towards a point or diverging exponentially fast Linear systems display sensitive dependence on initial conditions in the case of divergence For nonlinear systems this is one of the necessary but not sufficient conditions for chaotic behavior
